  <script>
    window.edaCapirsInitCallback = function (cb) {
      if (!cb) {
        return;
      }

      if (window.Adf && window.Adf.banner) {
        cb();
      } else {
        window.begun_new_callbacks = window.begun_new_callbacks || [];
        window.begun_new_callbacks.push({
          lib: {
            init: function () {
              cb();
            }
          }
        });
      }
    }
  </script>

    window.applyBranding = function () {
      window.branding = true;
      document.body.classList.add('_with-branding');

      if (typeof (GlobalPageData) != 'undefined') {
        GlobalPageData.window.trigger('refresh');
        GlobalPageData.narrow = true;
        GlobalPageData.window.trigger('branding-applied');
      }
    };

        <div class="box-col box-col__collapsedX">
          <div class="select-suggest js-select-suggest" data-select-suggest-value="all">
            <div class="g-relative">
              <input class="select-suggest__text-input js-select-suggest__input" id="kitchenItemsSuggest" type="text" placeholder="Любая кухня"/>
              <div class="select-suggest__toggle-box js-select-suggest__trigger">
                <div class="icon">
                  <svg>
                    <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#sv"></use>
                  </svg>
                </div>
              </div>
              <ul class="select-suggest__result js-select-suggest__result">
                <li class='item js-select-suggest__item' data-select-suggest-value="all">
                  Любая кухня
                </li>
                <li class='item separator' data-select-suggest-value="all">

                </li>

                </li>

                </li>

                </li>

                </li>

                </li>

                  Азербайджанская
                </li>
                <li class='item js-select-suggest__item indent ' data-select-suggest-value="evropeyskaya-kuhnya">
                  Европейская

        Подобрать рецепты
      </div>
      <div class="tag-selector__expand js-expand-block-trigger js-toggle-overlay"
           data-expand-block-id="expandableHeaderFilter"
           data-expand-block-options='{"duration": 200, "overlayClose": "true" }'
           data-overlay-options='{"htmlClass": "_not-scroll-hide"}'
           data-overlay-id="1"
           data-additional-id="1"
      >
        Ингредиенты, детали
        <span class="tag-selector__expand-counter js-updated-page__additionalFilterCount"></span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="tag-selector__additional-list">
    <div class="tag-selector__expand-block" id="expandableHeaderFilter">
      <div class="js-calculate-container">
        <div class="tag-selector__pad">
          <div class="tag-selector__selects-box">
            <div class="box-col">
              <label class="select-suggest__label">ВКЛЮЧИТЬ ИНГРЕДИЕНТЫ</label>
              <div class="adding-suggest js-adding-suggest"
                   data-initial="[]"
                   data-is-clearable="true"
                   data-name="include-ingredient"
              >
                <span class="adding-suggest__measurer js-adding-suggest__measurer"></span>
                <span class="adding-suggest__text-fader"></span>
                <div class="adding-suggest__input-place js-updated-page__include">
                  <ul class="adding-suggest__tags-list tags-list js-adding-suggest__tags-list ">
                    <li><input class="adding-suggest__text-input js-adding-suggest__input" type="text" placeholder="+ Ингредиент"/></li>
                  </ul>
                </div>
                <ul class="adding-suggest__result js-adding-suggest__result"></ul>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="box-col">
              <label class="select-suggest__label">ИСКЛЮЧИТЬ ИНГРЕДИЕНТЫ</label>
              <div class="adding-suggest js-adding-suggest"
                   data-initial="[]"
                   data-is-clearable="true"
                   data-name="exclude-ingredient"
              >
                <span class="adding-suggest__measurer js-adding-suggest__measurer"></span>
                <span class="adding-suggest__text-fader"></span>
                <div class="adding-suggest__input-place js-updated-page__exclude">
                  <ul class="adding-suggest__tags-list tags-list js-adding-suggest__tags-list ">
                    <li><input class="adding-suggest__text-input js-adding-suggest__input" type="text" placeholder="- Ингредиент"/></li>
                  </ul>
                </div>
                <ul class="adding-suggest__result js-adding-suggest__result"></ul>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class='tag-selector__additional-box '>
              <h4 class="title">ПОПУЛЯРНЫЕ ИНГРЕДИЕНТЫ</h4>
              <ul class="tags-list js-update-ingredients js-filter-top">
                <li class="tags-list_item _inline">
                  <a
                    data-href="https://eda.ru/recepty/ingredienty/13480"
                    data-object-id="13480"
                    class='tag  js-updated-page__linked-tag'
                    href="https://eda.ru/recepty/ingredienty/13480"
                  >
                    <span class="tag-name">Свинина</span>
                  </a>
                </li>
                <li class="tags-list_item _inline">
                  <a
                    data-href="https://eda.ru/recepty/ingredienty/13542"
                    data-object-id="13542"
                    class='tag  js-updated-page__linked-tag'
                    href="https://eda.ru/recepty/ingredienty/13542"
                  >
                    <span class="tag-name">Кокосовое молоко</span>
                  </a>
                </li>
                <li class="tags-list_item _inline">
                  <a
                    data-href="https://eda.ru/recepty/ingredienty/13469"
                    data-object-id="13469"
                    class='tag  js-updated-page__linked-tag'
                    href="https://eda.ru/recepty/ingredienty/13469"
                  >
                    <span class="tag-name">Говядина</span>
                  </a>
                </li>
                <li class="tags-list_item _inline">
                  <a
                    data-href="https://eda.ru/recepty/ingredienty/13680"
                    data-object-id="13680"

                    href="https://eda.ru/recepty/ingredienty/13680"
                  >
                    <span class="tag-name">Фарш</span>
                  </a>
                </li>
                <li class="tags-list_item _inline">
                  <a
                    data-href="https://eda.ru/recepty/ingredienty/13694"

                    href="https://eda.ru/recepty/ingredienty/13694"
                  >
                    <span class="tag-name">Кальмары</span>
                  </a>
                </li>
              </ul>
            </div>
            <div class="tag-selector__additional-box">
              <h4 class="title">ТИП РЕЦЕПТОВ</h4>
              <div class="box-col">

                    </svg>
                  </span>

<div class="recipe__instruction">
  <p class="g-h6">Инструкция приготовления</p>
  <div class="instruction-controls">
      <span class="time"><svg><use xlink:href="#timer" /></svg></span>
      <span>15 минут</span>
        <span class="recipe__print-link print js-print"><svg><use xlink:href="#print" /></svg></span>
    <span class="recipe__print-link js-print">Распечатать</span>
  </div>
  <ul class="recipe__steps">

      <li class='instruction clearfix js-steps__parent ' data-counter="1">
        <div class="instruction__wrap" itemscope itemprop="recipeInstructions" itemtype="http://schema.org/HowToStep">

          <span style="white-space: pre-line" class='instruction__description js-steps__description _no-photo'>
            <a name="step1"></a><span>1. </span><link itemprop="url" href="https://eda.ru/recepty/vypechka-deserty/blini-tonkie-na-kipjatke-i-moloke-42947#step1" /><span itemprop="text" style="font-family: 'PT Serif', Georgia, serif">Взбить в пену яйца  с солью.</span>
          </span>

            <span class="linked-content clearfix print-invisible">

              <span class="linked-content__image">
                
                <img src="https://static.eaglecdn.com/eda/logos/d/a/dada2714a2332b80ad17a8df81e0570159cea4c7.jpg?1484829141" alt="">

                  <span class="linked-content__video">
                    <svg>
                      <use xlink:href="#play" />
                    </svg>
                  </span>
              </span>
              <span class="linked-content__info">
                <a href="/video/testo/kak-prigotovit-blini-92" target="_blank" class="linked-content__link">Шпаргалка</a>
                <span class="linked-content__name js-popup-name">Как приготовить блины</span>
              </span>
              <a href="/video/testo/kak-prigotovit-blini-92" target="_blank" class="block-link "></a>
              <span class="linked-content__description js-popup-description" data-url=""></span>
            </span>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class='instruction clearfix js-steps__parent ' data-counter="2">
        <div class="instruction__wrap" itemscope itemprop="recipeInstructions" itemtype="http://schema.org/HowToStep">

          <span style="white-space: pre-line" class='instruction__description js-steps__description _no-photo'>
            <a name="step2"></a><span>2. </span><link itemprop="url" href="https://eda.ru/recepty/vypechka-deserty/blini-tonkie-na-kipjatke-i-moloke-42947#step2" /><span itemprop="text" style="font-family: 'PT Serif', Georgia, serif">Не переставая взбивать, влить стакан кипятка.</span>
          </span>

        </div>
      </li>
      <li class='instruction clearfix js-steps__parent ' data-counter="3">
        <div class="instruction__wrap" itemscope itemprop="recipeInstructions" itemtype="http://schema.org/HowToStep">

          <span style="white-space: pre-line" class='instruction__description js-steps__description _no-photo'>
            <a name="step3"></a><span>3. </span><link itemprop="url" href="https://eda.ru/recepty/vypechka-deserty/blini-tonkie-na-kipjatke-i-moloke-42947#step3" /><span itemprop="text" style="font-family: 'PT Serif', Georgia, serif">Не переставая взбивать, влить стакан холодного молока.</span>
          </span>

        </div>
      </li>
      <li class='instruction clearfix js-steps__parent ' data-counter="4">
        <div class="instruction__wrap" itemscope itemprop="recipeInstructions" itemtype="http://schema.org/HowToStep">

          <span style="white-space: pre-line" class='instruction__description js-steps__description _no-photo'>
            <a name="step4"></a><span>4. </span><link itemprop="url" href="https://eda.ru/recepty/vypechka-deserty/blini-tonkie-na-kipjatke-i-moloke-42947#step4" /><span itemprop="text" style="font-family: 'PT Serif', Georgia, serif">Всыпать 1 стакан муки.</span>
          </span>

        </div>
      </li>
      <li class='instruction clearfix js-steps__parent ' data-counter="5">
        <div class="instruction__wrap" itemscope itemprop="recipeInstructions" itemtype="http://schema.org/HowToStep">

          <span style="white-space: pre-line" class='instruction__description js-steps__description _no-photo'>
            <a name="step5"></a><span>5. </span><link itemprop="url" href="https://eda.ru/recepty/vypechka-deserty/blini-tonkie-na-kipjatke-i-moloke-42947#step5" /><span itemprop="text" style="font-family: 'PT Serif', Georgia, serif">В тесто добавить растительное масло.</span>
          </span>

        </div>
      </li>
      <li class='instruction clearfix js-steps__parent ' data-counter="6">
        <div class="instruction__wrap" itemscope itemprop="recipeInstructions" itemtype="http://schema.org/HowToStep">

          <span style="white-space: pre-line" class='instruction__description js-steps__description _no-photo'>
            <a name="step6"></a><span>6. </span><link itemprop="url" href="https://eda.ru/recepty/vypechka-deserty/blini-tonkie-na-kipjatke-i-moloke-42947#step6" /><span itemprop="text" style="font-family: 'PT Serif', Georgia, serif">Печь на горячей сковородке, смазанной оливковым или топленым сливочным маслом.</span>
          </span>

            <span class="linked-content clearfix print-invisible">

              <span class="linked-content__image">
                
                <img src="//s1.eda.ru/StaticContent/Photos/110801145258/1205042116017/p_O.jpg" alt="">

              </span>
              <span class="linked-content__info">
                <a href="/wiki/instrumenty/skovoroda-s-keramicheskim-pokritiem-92" target="_blank" class="linked-content__link">Инструмент</a>
                <span class="linked-content__name js-popup-name">Сковорода с керамическим покрытием</span>
              </span>
              <a href="/wiki/instrumenty/skovoroda-s-keramicheskim-pokritiem-92" target="_blank" class="block-link js-popup-link"></a>
              <span class="linked-content__description js-popup-description" data-url="https://eda.ru/img/eda/-x-i/s1.eda.ru/StaticContent/Photos/110808212803/120304025258/p_O.jpg">Бельгийцы из Green Pan восстали против тефлона. Они со страстью проповедника рассказывают, что раскаленный больше чем на 260 градусов политетрафторэтилен токсичен и некоторых птичек вообще убивает на месте. Взамен предлагается новое антипригарное покрытие термолон, которое не содержит вредных для здоровья химикатов и позволяет при этом жарить в малом количестве масла. </span>
            </span>
        </div>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>


  <div class="recipe__divider"></div>
<div class="g-print-visible recipe__current-link _narrow-content js-current-url"></div>

    <div class="recipe__social">
      <p class="g-h6">Поделиться:</p>
      <div class="social-horizontal rambler-share print-invisible"></div>

      <span class="recipe__error print-invisible js-recipe-find-error" id="find-error">Нашли ошибку?</span>
    </div>

          <li><a href="https://eda.ru/recepty/vypechka-deserty"><span>Выпечка и десерты</span></a></li>
      </ul>

      <h3 class="horizontal-tile__item-title item-title">
        <a href="/recepty/vypechka-deserty/tonkie-blini-na-moloke-16014">
          <span>
            Тонкие блины на&nbsp;молоке
          </span>
        </a>
                <a href="https://eda.ru/recepty/afishaeda">
          <svg class="item-title__special item-title__special_logo">
            <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#logo"></use>
          </svg>
        </a>
      </h3>

      <div class="horizontal-tile__author">
        Автор: <span class="horizontal-tile__author-link js-click-link" data-href="https://eda.ru/avtory/602599" content="Настасья Бондарева">Настасья Бондарева</span>
      </div>



      <div class="horizontal-tile__item-specifications random-class-8297d9a6-49a0-4444-aa62-1a86f7b3a558">
        <div class="inline-dropdown js-toggle-class"
             data-toggle-class-options='{
                "toggleClass": "inline-dropdown_active",

              }'>
          6 ингредиентов

          </span>

        <div class="inline-dropdown__dropdown">
          <div class="inline-dropdown__dropdown-pad">

            <div class="ingredients-list ingredients-list_mini">


<div class="ingredients-list__header">
  <p class="ingredients-list__title g-h6">Ингредиенты</p>
  <div class="ingredients-list__portions-control portions-control print-invisible">
    <span class="portions-control__hint">порции</span>

      </svg>
    </span>

      <svg>

      </svg>
    </span>
  </div>
</div>

    <span class="content-item__name tooltip">
      <span class="js-tooltip js-tooltip-ingredient"
            data-url="/Ingredient/RecipePreview"
            data-id="13458">
        Пшеничная мука
      </span>
    </span>
    <span class="content-item__measure js-ingredient-measure-amount" data-id="13458">400 г</span>
  </p>
  <p class="ingredients-list__content-item content-item js-cart-ingredients" data-ingredient-object='{"id": 13410, "name": "Сахар", "amount": "2 столовые ложки"}'>
    <span class="content-item__name tooltip">
      <span class="js-tooltip js-tooltip-ingredient"
            data-url="/Ingredient/RecipePreview"
            data-id="13410">
        Сахар
      </span>
    </span>
    <span class="content-item__measure js-ingredient-measure-amount" data-id="13410">2 столовые ложки</span>
  </p>
  <p class="ingredients-list__content-item content-item js-cart-ingredients" data-ingredient-object='{"id": 13418, "name": "Куриное яйцо", "amount": "5 штук"}'>
    <span class="content-item__name tooltip">
      <span class="js-tooltip js-tooltip-ingredient"
            data-url="/Ingredient/RecipePreview"
            data-id="13418">
        Куриное яйцо
      </span>
    </span>
    <span class="content-item__measure js-ingredient-measure-amount" data-id="13418">5 штук</span>
  </p>
  <p class="ingredients-list__content-item content-item js-cart-ingredients" data-ingredient-object='{"id": 13453, "name": "Молоко", "amount": "1 л"}'>
    <span class="content-item__name tooltip">
      <span class="js-tooltip js-tooltip-ingredient"
            data-url="/Ingredient/RecipePreview"
            data-id="13453">

    <span class="content-item__measure js-ingredient-measure-amount" data-id="13453">1 л</span>

          <span>50</span>
        </span>
        <span class="widget-list__like-count widget-list__like-count_dislike">
          <svg>

          </svg>
          <span>20</span>
        </span>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="horizontal-tile__bottom-content-item">
      <div class="select-dropdown select-dropdown_inline js-bookmark js-select-dropdown">

<div class="tile-list__horizontal-tile horizontal-tile js-portions-count-parent js-bookmark__obj">
  <div class="clearfix">
    <div class="horizontal-tile__preview " data-label-image=''>


      <div class='horizontal-tile__item-link js-click-link '
           data-href="/recepty/vypechka-deserty/vkusnye-blinchiki-na-moloke-i-vode-53338">

        <div class='horizontal-tile__cover'>
        </div>
          <div class="lazy-load-container js-lazy-loading" data-title="Вкусные блинчики на молоке и воде" data-alt="Вкусные блинчики на молоке и воде" data-src="https://eda.ru/img/eda/c285x285i/s1.eda.ru/StaticContent/Photos/120131111458/151101083031/p_O.jpg">
            <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="horizontal-tile__preview-image js-lazy-loading-svg"
                 xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
                 width="180" height="180"
                 viewBox="0 0 180 180">
              <filter id="blur" filterUnits="userSpaceOnUse" color-interpolation-filters="sRGB">
                <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="10 10" edgeMode="duplicate" />
                <feComponentTransfer>
                  <feFuncA type="discrete" tableValues="1 1" />
                </feComponentTransfer>
              </filter>
              <image filter="url(#blur)"
                     xlink:href="https://eda.ru/img/eda/c20x20i/s1.eda.ru/StaticContent/Photos/120131111458/151101083031/p_O.jpg"
                     x="0" y="0"
                     height="100%" width="100%"/>
            </svg>
          </div>

      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="horizontal-tile__content">

      <ul class="breadcrumbs">

  (function(w) {
    /** 
      * Setup puid in /javascript/modules/insert-advert/index.js 
    */

    if (!w.EDA) {
      w.EDA = {};
    }

    w.EDA['page_is_single'] = 1;
    w.EDA['page_category_name'] = 'recipe';

<script type="text/javascript">
	var _top100q = _top100q || [];
	_top100q.push(['setAccount', '2635991']);
	_top100q.push(['trackPageview']);
 
	(function(){
	  var pa = document.createElement("script"); pa.type = "text/javascript"; pa.async = true;
	  pa.src = ("https:" == document.location.protocol ? "https:" : "http:") + "//st.top100.ru/pack/pack.min.js";
	  var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(pa, s);
	})();
</script>



<script type="text/javascript">
	(function () {
		/**
		 * #EDA-6104
		 * Init in /Recipe/_NutritionInfo.cshtml
		 */
		if (window.recipe_energy && window.recipe_energy.length) {
			let geneated_energy = [];

			for (let i = 0; i < window.recipe_energy.length; i++) {
				let energy = window.recipe_energy[i];
				for (let key in energy) {
					if (energy.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
						geneated_energy.push(key + ':' + energy[key]);
					}
				}
			}

            if (window.ga) {
                window.ga('set', 'dimension11', geneated_energy.join('|'));
            }
		}
		
		if (window.ga) {
			window.ga('send', 'pageview');
		}
	})();
 </script>

        domainName: "eda.ru",

        };


  </script>

<script>
  (function() {
    var containerSelector = '.rambler-share';
    if (!document.querySelector(containerSelector)) {
      return
    }
    var init = function() {
      RamblerShare.init(containerSelector, {
        "style": {
          "buttonHeight": 32,
          "iconSize": 15,
          "borderRadius": 3,
          "counterSize": 13,
          "font": "PT Sans"
        },
        "counters": true,
        facebook: {
          utm: "utm_source=edafb&utm_medium=social",
          useRamblerIdServerRequest: true
        },
        vkontakte: {
          utm: "utm_source=edavk&utm_medium=social"
        },
        odnoklassniki: {
          utm: "utm_source=edaok&utm_medium=social"
        },
        pinterest: {
          utm: "utm_source=edapn&utm_medium=social"
        },
        twitter: {
          utm: "utm_source=edatw&utm_medium=social"
        },
        email: {
          utm: "utm_source=edaml&utm_medium=social"
        },
        whatsapp: {
          utm: "utm_source=edawa&utm_medium=social"
        },
        copy: {
          utm: "utm_source=edacp&utm_medium=social"
        },
        "buttons": [
          "facebook",
          "vkontakte",
          "odnoklassniki",
          "pinterest",
          "twitter",
          "email",
          "whatsapp",
          "copy"
        ]
      });

      RamblerShare.events.on('share', function (social_id) {
        ga('send', 'event', 'social-share', 'click', social_id || 'undefined');
      });
    };
    var script = document.createElement('script');
    script.onload = init;
    script.async = true;
    script.src = 'https://developers.rambler.ru/likes/v1/widget.js';
    document.head.appendChild(script);
  })();
</script>
